lines.text: 11. You (grunts) just catch yourself on the edge. Your fingers are (shh) sliding off the edge right now. You're barely holding on.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I turn and I cast Grasping Vine from up here and try and yank him back up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Trinket turns and puts his claws into Grog's hand.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Smart bear.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So in a very Scar in The Lion King moment (whoosh)-- (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (yells) Just drop me!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do take four points of slashing damage from the claws that dig into your hands as Trinket is holding onto you there. Then a vine streaks out from the stonework, wraps around you, and pulls you up out of Trinket's grasp, slamming into the ceiling and now holding you aloft before it drops you, plopping right into the stonework between the rest of the party.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Good to join us, Grog.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, no big deal.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Good to know you can jump at all.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Yes, how'd that work for you?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Listen, an example of what not to do.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are your hands okay?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. Should we proceed? What is all this dilly-dally?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are the doors locked?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You go ahead and push on the door?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Wait! What are you doing over there?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are there traps on the door? I check for traps.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Wait up-- okay, go for it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an investigation check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do me proud!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Looking over it, there is what looks to be a locking mechanism on it, but it is not currently locked.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, that was lucky.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is it?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (door squeaking sound) I push?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You push? (thump) It doesn't budge. You have to put some of your weight behind it to get it to shift at all, and it (creak) opens up slightly into a pitch-black room ahead of you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh good, more darkness.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: I peek in and, using my darkvision, see what I can see for 60 feet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, make a perception check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to catch up with the ladies and acrobatics over to them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 20-- 33, excuse me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. Yeah, you (impact). Around the edge--

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Balls-- ten.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ten? It's hard to make out much detail in the room; you can see what appears-- the room just lays out before you. It seems to open up slightly, and then even further partway in. It ends on the opposite side with curved corners. You can see what appears to be four pillars in the room that meet the floor to the ceiling, the ceiling which is about 25 feet tall. Most of the tunnels you've passed through here are about 15 to 20: this is about 25 feet tall at its full height. But these pillars reach to the ceiling, and there are steps across the way, what appears to be a raised platform. That's the most detail you can make out of it at this distance-- you'd have to get close.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Can't see much. It's a taller ceiling, there seems to be a platform in the middle and some pillars.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Like a platform like a tomb?

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: No, I can't see, really.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Like an altar?

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: It's a slightly raised platform, that's-- Grog, can you help? Can you do anything, can you see any further than me?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I come over, and-- 'cause I have 60 feet of darkvision. Can I try?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, make a Perception check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nah, I can't see shit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, I'll look. I've also got darkvision, so-- 12.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, you all come to the same conclusion-- some sort of raised platform across the way.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Right, it's sort of a platform, but you can't really tell what it is.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sort of curved to the back-- I could probably sketch it for you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I stealth? I want to stealth. And perceive-- I'm going to, like, step in.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, let's just go in there.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Wait a second, hold on a second, this is the only thing we can do.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you guys stealth into the room. You sneak in, and you can see now, this slime-type substance that you've seen throughout--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh! 30, because of Pass without a Trace, which is still on us.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right-- it seems to coat most of the floor and walls of this interior. You guys step inside, and with what little bit of light you have, you see a couple shapes shift across the way, behind the platform.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: That's not good.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (whispers) All right, everybody, get ready to play.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What? Play?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (whispers) There's definitely creatures in here. I don't know if they're hostile.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I reach down-- are there any rocks or pebbles or anything on the ground?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You find a couple of small pebbles.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (whispers) Can I just shoot an arrow?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I take a pebble, I throw it all the way towards the platform.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Don't waste an arrow.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Do either of you speak Undercommon?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I do.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: They're jawas.

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Ooh!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Secrets, secrets, secrets.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Check out the Geek and Sundry store for fantastic Critical Role-themed products and merchandise! There are shirts and posters for sale!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (gasps) Ohh! I forgot! Wait! (gasps) Shh!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What's the matter? (whispers) What's the matter?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (whispers) They know we're here. Obviously, you threw a fucking rock. They want to fight us-- whatever it is they're protecting-- this champion's--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They want to bite us?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't know if anyone can hear you when you're whispering.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You want me to just yell it out?

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Well, if they know we're here--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Cool. Hey, there's people on the other fucking side, and they're going to attack us when we walk in here. They're saying to defend his fucking tomb.

lines.name: SAM, WILL
lines.text: Oh.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Right place.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: So they've been in the dark for a long time, is that right? I'm going to cast some light as bright as I possibly can.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm stealthing to the side.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Stealthing to the side.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Kashaw jumps up with Zahra; they cast Light at the same time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Light spell is about as powerful as decent torchlight, it doesn't become crazy, you know, Gandalf-Bridge-of-Khazad-Dum-style.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: (Gandalf voice) You shall not pass!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. But it does light up the room, and from what you can see now, immediately across the way, atop this platform there is what looks to be another stone, raised platform or what could be considered as some sort of a tomb or stone coffin that lays atop these stairs on this upper platform. There is another humanoid figure that stands on top, that turns around at the light and you can see the light giving that weird, ominous animal eye-glow whenever the light catches it at an awkward angle, the fish face snarling at you, robes drenched in various liquid and mucus-y fluid swish around for a minute as it turns to you, this fish humanoid clutching this big staff. You can see now three other of these fish-like entities all clamor up from the side, holding onto these spears and these weird buckler-type shields on the side of their arms, and they just (loud Undercommon).

lines.name: LAURA, MARY
lines.text: What'd he say?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I want to get up and meet him at a--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You can also make donations to our charities of choice-- Find links to those on Geek and Sundry.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I use my earring and I whisper, they're calling to their master! Something big. I stay stealthed.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. The rest of you--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, shit--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Stealth, stealth, stealth, stealth, stealth!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right, we have two of you have stealthed inside, and you've rolled stealth for this?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Rolled stealth?

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: And we still all have Pass without a Trace on us?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, everybody still has Pass Without a Trace.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is this new stealth?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It doesn't matter, there's two big light sources in the front of the door. This is going to be an initiative roll, folks.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Look, there's the broken floor!

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Oh, it's so pretty! There are the pillars!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, wow, the detail!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thank you, Dwarven Forge.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Who was this made by?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Dwarven Forge, folks.

lines.name: MARY, LIAM
lines.text: Dwarven Forge.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's awesome.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so. This door here has been opened for the moment. The folks that were still back in this tunnel here-- We have Zahra and Kash that walked in and created the light, Trinket is still back here at this point-- Scanlan, you're at the edge of the door, Percy-- And we have Kima in the back there, holding up the range. Across the way we have the one robed individual and these other frog-type creatures that have stepped out from behind here. All righty. So. Let's go ahead and get some initiative rolls, folks.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Was I supposed to roll stealth at all on that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, if you rolled--

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Ew. Do you add it to anything?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, you have an initiative number.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 29 for something.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ooh!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so. 25 to 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nice.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, 17. And 17.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: 17 for Scanlan.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So Grog is 17, Scanlan is 17.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 19 for Vax.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, 19 for Vax.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What'd you roll, five?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Uh huh-- nine, ten--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so that's15 to ten?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Percy. Ten to five?

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: (higher) Fiiiiiiiiive!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Just me and Grog.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Keyleth, what'd you get?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Four.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Four.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Four, yeah! Lucky number four.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, man. Kima rolled really bad, too.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Kima, you're very quiet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have nine people in your traveling group, plus a bear. Trying not to over-complicate this. You mass-traveling assholes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: She's very focused and studying our styles.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Exactly. All right. All right, so, Vex, you have the top of the round.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Awesome. I'm going to-- ooh! Is this Sneak Attack, because I'm stealthed?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Technically you would Sneak Attack if you hit somebody who has not-- you don't know if they've seen you or not.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, okay. I'm going to cast Lightning Arrow on the guy in the middle, 'cause everything within ten feet is hit. Oh, you know what? I was using those little blocks as feet marks-- is that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, I mean, these are five feet each, so it would get those two there if you were to do it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is there light? Oh, they lit torches, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It wouldn't get the two guys down--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It would get these two there; this guy is actually beyond the ten-foot radius if you were to hit the middle guy.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. So let's do the middle guy and-- yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Aw man, which one, which one?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Let's do this-- That's 30? 30.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 30 hits--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Pass without a Trace now drops, by the way. All right, so go ahead and roll damage against that guy.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Lightning Arrow is 4d8 lightning damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct. So go ahead and roll that for the main guy.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. 27 plus sneak attack?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 29 points of damage. Fantastic, and then it is 2d8 against the other two if they do not make their dexterity saving throw. So what's the DC on the spell? Well, that's a natural 20--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: One of them succeeds, one of them fails.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So roll 2d8.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The bolts then scatter off and shoot into two of the nearby ones. One of them manages to pull right behind the pillar and manage to avoid most of the impact. The one over here, however, takes the brunt of it and doubles over in pain, almost falling onto its knees. They start croaking back to each other.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to move--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Do you wish to move yourself or Trinket?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, I'm going to move behind that wall there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right here?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. And Trinket, you want to move--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Trinket is going to--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Don't forget you have your pointers, guys.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Move-- I don't know where that is-- move behind the pillar. Can he get there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: His movement speed is 40?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe? Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You get there, yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. Cool.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. That brings us to Vax.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I dunno if this laser pointer's going to work, since there's now a wall in the way. I'm going to go up the side-- I'm going to hit my heel against the other heel--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I love that you're pointing it at the TV.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to go right to that window right there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right here?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to chuck three daggers at Fish Guy up here on the dais. Through the window.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's not a surprise because they were aware that there was an aggressive action coming in. But you still--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But because I go first I get advantage on all attacks.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct, so. So it's three against this guy?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Against guy on the dais, yeah. Is 28?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hits.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Second one is 14, and the third one is 27.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All three hit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All three hit, so the first one we'll do a sneak attack on, and here we go.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No sneak attack.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, sorry. Advantage. Thank you. 11 for the first, ten for the second, and eight for the third.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This includes sneak attack damage?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I thought you said it didn't get sneak attack--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have advantage, no no no-- You don't have surprise.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Right, but because I have advantage, I automatically-- So yes! Sneak attack on the first-- The first one was--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It was ten plus whatever the dice roll is.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I rolled a full four, so that's four plus eight plus-- That's 13, 19, 24, 28, 32, 34--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's better.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's the dice, 34, so 68 plus seven is 75.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You double the dice, yeah?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If it's a surprise, you-- okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sneak Attack, sorry, I always get this fucking shit confused. Sorry. So half of that is, so 34 plus seven is 41.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 41 points of damage.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Always get it confused. Every fucking time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's all good. So, after the energy from the arrow is still dissipating from the blast, you've already rushed behind through the small space in the wall and thrown all three daggers, all sinking into the body of the robed frog creature, who doubles over from pain, slamming into the top of the stone sarcophagus. In doing so, its hand hits it and a bunch of black feathers scatter off the top and come to rest on the ground at the bottom of the raised platform. Does that end your turn?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'd like to use the rest of my movement just to sink down with my back against the wall, out of the way of the window.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so that should be there. All right, that ends your turn. Kashaw.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Okay. How far away are they?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're about 45-ish, 40 to 45 feet.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 50 from whoever's in the lead.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: I think I'm going to do a-- how close are the three together? Or, there's four, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's four of them, yeah.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: So those-- how close are the three to the top there, I don't have a laser pointer.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Here? I mean they're all within ten feet of each other. Ten to 15 feet.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: I think I am going to do a 5th-level Flame Strike.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Whoa.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: On-- if they're within ten feet, I can hit all three of those guys right there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, Dexterity saves: fail, fail and fail. Go ahead and roll some damage.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: So it's a 20, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, you already hit with them, sorry-- I take that back. You just do straight damage to them, and they don't get any reduction in that because they missed their saves, so you just roll the dice and that's how much damage they take.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: And is it a 20?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, it's 4d6 fire damage and 4d6 radiant damage, so 8d6 total.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You got it.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Ah, come on.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Whoa, that's good!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Are you going to stay where you are or are you moving in?

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: No, I'd like to then move in, closer to Trinket.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (cheering)

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Yes, my brother!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. And that ends your turn. He doesn't have a turn anymore. At this point in time--

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: I'm sensing something big is on the way

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Vax! Did you see that?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm under cover, I'm pressed to a wall. I saw a flash of something.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Amazing! Oh, sorry, I won't draw attention to it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There is this echoing mutter, this almost burbling that seems to rise up behind Kima and Percy at this point.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You glance over your shoulder into the darkness below the collapsed tunnel, and what little bit of light you see coming through, you see something fleshy rise up from underneath. It's glistening in places and immediately a cold shudder crawls down your back as you see a series of appendages release, each with a gleaming eye at the end of each one.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (gasps) No.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As one giant eye rises up, it--

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: No! (yelling)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Son of a bitch!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, fuck. Oh, fuck.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We weren't prepared!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Not cool.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (muffled) Oh my god!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As it rises up and Kima looks over the shoulder-- "Shit!" It's going to be a beam at Kima, a beam at you Percy, and a beam at Grog since you're visible.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: (laughs) Shit just got real! And we're all just, we're stuck in the room now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Against Percy, I need you to make a dexterity save.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Wake up, everybody!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What's going against him right now?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's 19.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A 19, okay. Great. A dull green beam arcs past, and you manage to just duck out of the way-- Slams into the stone wall next to you, of which that stone wall now just turns to dust. Disintegrated rock behind you. The one against Kima, see if she makes her save here-- No, she fails. This beam hits Kima square in the chest, and as it does she doesn't seem to have any physical reaction but she begins to back up instinctually from it. You can see her jaw agape, her eyes wide open, she looks like she is filled with the dread of the ages. And the third beam going towards Grog, have to reroll that, need you to make a dexterity save, Grog.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm not raging or anything. 19.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 19, great. A strangely quicksilver-like beam strikes you center in the chest. It hits you and you feel the muscles around your chest begin to seize up and crack into dust like the actual flesh is turning to a slightly hardened stone but you flex and resist the effect, the petrification not beginning to take hold within your body.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Petrification--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't remember all the things, I don't remember all the things! Oh no!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's everything-- Yeah, they've got fear, disintegration--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It comes with everything!

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: And fries and a coke!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There's a fuck-you beam too, there's like literally a fuck-you beam

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Oh my god, you're going into a special section of your book. That's never good.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I've got a list, I've got a fiends book.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Oh my god, of course you do.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ah, he's moving!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So as it turns up, its beam striking you, after all the beams hit, it turns around and (incomprehensible growling). Speaking in a language you don't understand unless one of you speaks Deep Speech.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Deep Speech? I speak Common!

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Yeah, is that the same as Giant?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And Gnomish!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is that above us or is that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's right above you, he's just hovering right over your heads. And it stops right above you, Grog. That ends its turn.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Just on this one, 'cause I don't know what hits yet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You get two attacks.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yep. Terrible. 12.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 12. You go to swing and you miss entirely.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You swing with a 17 and once again, just in your fury and anger in it flying overhead and the little bit of intensity of its reveal, you just can't seem to find purchase on its body.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 17 does not hit, FYI.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Got it, got it, got it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, Grog, you want to move or you going to stay where you are?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I am going to move like the sweet dewdrop that I am, and haul ass behind-- I've got a little pointer. I'm going to move behind that column.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, you can get there fine.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That'll end my turn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. As you rush past, it's going to go ahead and use a reaction to make a bite attack at you as you speed beneath it. Oh, that is a 24 to hit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That hits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You take 14 points of piercing damage, reduced to seven. As its teeth just reach out and bite towards you, streaking across your shoulder as you push out of the pain, continuing forward. All right, that ends Grog's turn, Scanlan, you're up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Jesus. Can it see me? I'm right under it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It doesn't seem to notice you at the moment, no.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It seems to be intent, looking towards Zahra and Kashaw at the moment, as they are immediately in front of it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to attempt to use my Wand of Fire-- oh no, no, that's a bad idea. I'm going to use my Lightning Bolt! Lightning Bolt on it. Lightning Bolt. 'Cause I'm right under it, right? So it'll just go straight up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's an 11.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. So I can roll for something?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, go ahead and roll 8d6 points of lightning damage against it, because you're doing it at a level three?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes, please.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So yeah, so 8d6 lightning damage.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's really good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 30 points of damage. Nice! So as you release this bolt of energy, you guys see this flash of blue light in the distance as the bolt slams up into the creature from underneath. All its eyes whip around in your direction for a second, before looking around all the areas around it. It's still focused intently in your guys' direction. Do you wish to move or do you want to stay where you are?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, I assume it sees me now, but I'll slowly back away.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, Percy's in your way so you have to back over in this direction.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Does it kill me while I move?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, it's already made its reaction.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And then I will turn to Zahra and I will sing to her to inspire her. I'll sing: (sings) Zahra, a rainbow! Zahra, a sunrise! Zahra the moon to wear! That's not good enough, no, not good enough, not for Zahra! (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, you take a d10 inspiration die, so keep that on hand.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I always like the bail out at the end.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's the best. All right, that ends your turn. Percy, you're up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh boy! First thing I'm going to do-- So it took its reaction, so does that mean if I run around it it can't take an attack of opportunity on me or is--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct, yes. If you wanted to move past it, yes, you could.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to try and run past it, full speed, yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There you go, that's about as far as you can get in a direct line.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay, that will do. I'm going to-- What's the smart play here?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Keep it going, Percy, what are you going to do?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, sorry, I'm going to cast Hex on the little fish creature. I know that sounds odd, but that's what I'm doing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (offscreen clatter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, Percy, as you go to cast the spell, you release the incantation. Nothing happens.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's fine. I'm going to take a trick shot at the beholder.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So I'm going to shoot for the head, that tends to go well. Oh, thank god. No, that's going to miss. That's a 15.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 15. Unfortunately, in your sudden fear of realizing the spell not happening, you go to fire and it just ricochets off the stone.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right, I'm going to take another shot. Same thing. Headshot.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's a little better. 20

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 20 does hit.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: 20 hits, so that's-- God damn it, I'm rolling really poorly. That's eight points of piercing damage. Plus he has to make a constitution save.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, or?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Or, if he missed his constitution save, that means he's disadvantage on attacks until the end of his turn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Good to know. The rays don't make attacks so the only thing that it would affect is his bite.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay. That's--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Good to know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It just looks at you and the ray hits you and it's your attempt to try to get out of the way. That's how it works.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Good fucking god! Then just, I suppose, with my last attack I'm going to shoot that fish person, just 'cause we should really clear the board.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, go for it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's better! 20-- 31.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 31, that hits. Go ahead and roll damage.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (blows raspberry) Eight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Eight damage? So as you turn around the third shot fires, it slams into the fish creature. You see, like, blowing part of its neck out, it (choking grunt). It's pretty heavily hurt, but still standing. It looks to be almost like, with the pain it's withstanding as it's looking up at this, it's reverent and raising its spear toward the Beholder, like (Undercommon chanting).

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Four more years! (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, that's Percy. It is now that creature's turn.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Vasselheim's going to pay for it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's going to be 'uge.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: 'Uge. Tiny hands, 'uge.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, six. It's going to move up to you after you shot it. Percy, it's going to make an attack with its spear on you with both hands. It pulls up and goes towards you, its big old fish mouth snapping. Oh! That's going to be a 21?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to take the hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. As it jams the spear into your side, it hits your shoulder and just streaks off, tearing into the flesh a little bit, but it's not too bad. You end up taking-- okay, that's nine points of piercing damage. All right! That ends its turn. Keyleth, you're up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, first things first, I'm going to--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Actually, sorry. Before the end of your turn, out of frustration at being shot, it's going to use one of its action points to shoot-- I'm sorry, one of its legendary actions to shoot another eye ray at random, at the end of Percy's turn.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Where's that laser pointer?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's going to shoot at me, isn't it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What? Come on--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Kima's strength save... Natural two. So that's going to be the telekinetic ray, it's going to move it 30 feet in any direction. It's going to lift Kima above this hole and just drop her. Kima, unable to do anything at this point, struck with fear from the previous ray and is nowhere near the edge, is just thrown off and plummets into the darkness below, where the beholder originally emerged. You just hear her scream (screams) as the echo continues past. You don't even hear an impact. That sucked.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Oh my god.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Now it's your turn, Keyleth.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh my god-- do I still have enough time to do a bonus reaction to try and save her with a Grasping Vine, or is she gone?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I will say go ahead and roll a dexterity check. Just a straight dexterity check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (groans) Straight dexterity?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you look over--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I rolled a natural two.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: --before you have an opportunity to get that thought in your head, she vanishes into the darkness.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughing nervously) Oh shit, Kima just died.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: (laughing) Why are you laughing!? Holy shit!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: She may not be dead. She may just be really, really wet and broken.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: She landed in the slime.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah! Yeah, maybe it's soft and cushy!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What are you doing, Keyleth?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to try and move behind him so-- I'm not, like, in his eye cone, am I?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right now you're not, no. So you can move--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No no, behind him a bit-- I'm going to cast Blight at fifth level on him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, god. I'm so afraid. So it's going to do 9d8 damage-- anyone give me some d8s? d8 me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, constitution saving throw--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fail it, motherfucker.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 11, so yeah. Full damage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah! All right, okay. Eight, ten, 15, 17. So, four more. These were at 17-- That could've been better. What'd I say, 17? Plus another seven, this is 33 damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Some of the eyestalks quiver and look in the direction of where you are, and some glance down and see you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So we established that this moss-slime isn't natural, it's not like a plant.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And now I'm going to use my bonus action to go into earth elemental form.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Return to form.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes. This worked last time.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: What does that mean, Keyleth?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: She turns into a giant rock monster.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That ends your turn. At the end of your turn it's going to use another legendary action to fire another ray. This one is going to be-- this is going to be at Scanlan, as it's the one that's clear and behind it. It sees you transform into earth elemental form--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do I still have enough movement to where I can, like, go underground? Can I do that, or no?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can travel into earth. You cannot travel into, like, solid stone, carved stone.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is there any earth around?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not immediately visible. Actually, there is, in the wall that it disintegrated when it tried to shoot Percy, so yeah, right up in here there would be.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I, like, Homer Simpson (slurps) into the wall?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. (slurps) You vanish into the wall there. But you can only emerge from that same spot.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But you are in the wall. Okay! It's going-- and since you've disappeared, it goes ahead and takes the ray shot at Scanlan. Scanlan, I need you to go ahead and make a dexterity saving throw.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is this a spell?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, this is not a spell.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can I use Cutting Words on it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is not an actual attack--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, it just happens.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But you can use Cutting Words to reduce the damage if you want to.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, then, I'll just make my what, dexterity sa--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Your dexterity save, yes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hmm, yeah, great. Five?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Five.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: To be fair, I think I still have your Enhance Ability up--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ability checks. Ability checks, not saving throws. So you can see one eyestalk that was looking for Keyleth hones in on you and this eye has no iris, just a deep, thick, black pupil. And a streaking beam, it sounds like a shrieking voice, just (shrieks) streaks out and slams into you, this black, solid beam. You take 55 points of necrotic damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (gasps) Oh my god.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah. Sure, sure, yeah. Yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I hate beholders so much.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That ends Keyleth's turn. Kima's turn.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is she unconscious or is she awake?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We're going to find out.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: She's possibly still falling, it could be a really deep hole.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: She's like, 'Damn, this is taking forever.'

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Does not make the acrobatics check--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Look at this guy, he's cold as the universe.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Doing so much math.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You hear a distant echo of a slam of impact that seems like the breaking of water, along with the hitting of stone. You hear this distant, echoing (groans) "Ouch."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, she's alive.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, we hear her say something, I mean, she's not underwater drowning or anything.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Zahra, you're up.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: All right, if I move to this tiny little alcove, right there. Can it see me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're not within its main eye, but it can see everything around it.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Then I'm going to Hex it? No, no, I'm going to use Witch Bolt.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. What level?

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: I'm a warlock, what level can I use it at?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, what level would it be? It would be your max level as a warlock.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: I don't know, I'm sorry--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Six. Seven.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Six. Seven was last week, and that doesn't count anymore!

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: No. You can't finger it to death!

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: I can't finger it to death and I want-- wait, what? (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Wow.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Which is a plus 11 attack bonus, and then 5d12 plus two.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you, yeah, correct. Well, technically it would be 6d12 if you're doing it at a sixth level.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have to roll to-- It'd be a d20, and add your ranged spell bonus.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: What is my ranged spell attack bonus? Do you know that?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Your ranged attack bonus? 11.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and roll 6d12 lightning damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 6d12!? Holy crap, girl!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's hot.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: God, I can't get 'fingered to death' outta my head.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: 24. Close. Better than the other ones.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: 24 plus two.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So 26. All right, so the lightning blasts into its side. One of the nearest stalks just looks over at you to acknowledge the impact, and you just hear a slight snarl as the eye looks out of the corner towards you. Is that going to end your turn?

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Mm-hmm.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Brings us to the top. Vex, you're up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. Am I-- can it see me in its eye? Would I be in its thingy?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is looking in your direction.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to move stealthily along the wall so I can maybe be out of that thing. Can I be?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't know. We'll find out when you stop. To there? You would still be in the eye range.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Fuckin' shit bitch.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Only she can get away with that. None of the rest of us can.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Am I hiding? Am I still hidden?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, because you revealed yourself in the attack you did a little while ago. I mean, you can duck partially. If you want to use an action to try and hide you can do that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, I don't want to do that, I just want to make my motion hide behind a pillar, maybe.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: But she's weighed down by the book!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, I appreciate it. My pouches are still pretty heavy. I'm going to hold my action until he's looking away from me. And I want to move Trinket behind the wall.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Actually, no, not Grog. It can still see the pillar-- no, Grog, because you're one of the few, like, big individuals in its front way that's not in its ray.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Does the pillar grant me any cover at all?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nope! We'll see what it does, though. All right, I need you to make a constitution saving throw.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 20, actually. 11 plus nine is 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, cool. So, as a yellowish beam streaks across and slams into your back, you feel your back muscles tense up and lock up and you resist the effect once again. You just have that hardy constitution of a goliath who seems to be resisting every one of these beams that slams into you for the time being. Vax, it's your turn.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to use Cunning Action to hide, and then I'm going to run along the back wall to the pillar by-- across from Vex, at the back of the chamber. And if counting is right, I'm 60 feet away from the beholder.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You'd be just within 60 feet.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Just within, right. That's what I thought, and I'm going to throw three daggers at his fuckin' eyeball.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it. You used your bonus action to hide, so you get two attacks.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I clicked the heels.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right. But you only have one attack with your main action.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, right! Thanks. And do I have advantage-- no one's near him, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have to roll a stealth check to see if he sees you or not.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right. Use my last Luck. No, that's okay because I'm me, so that is 25.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 25, okay. So go ahead and roll your attacks.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right, so the first attack was an eight-- 18.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 18 hits. And you do have advantage on these because he does not see you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. So the first attack was 18 plus-- sorry, it was 30--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hits.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And the second attack was 28.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Both hit. Go ahead and roll damage, and sneak attack on the first hit because he did not see where you were. Surprisingly, being an entity covered in eyes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: One plus two, five, ten, 11, 15, 16, 17, 20 for the first. No, 27.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Seven, yeah, all right, okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And then the second attack is-- ten.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Got it. 37. Rushing up behind the side, ducking into the shadows, you go around the pillar and-- watch one dagger spin around and watch a second one. Both of them sinking into him. Adjusts in place angrily from the pain and impact, but-- yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I also make a little, like, raspberry noise at the end and go (pffbt).

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Kashaw, you're up.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: I know, but if he's looking right at me-- I mean, he can see me, essentially, looking right at me, correct?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Everything else except for you and Percy are directly out of the main eye, but his eyestalks look all over the entire room and they keep shifting and taking in the awareness of the surroundings. But the big eye is just staring right at you intently.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Can I get out of the direct-- well, can you cast magic against the big eye or no?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't know.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: So should we give it a shot? See, that's the thing, is he's staring right at me.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You could move out of it.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: First thing we want to do is run away. Can we get out of the range of the eye somehow?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Possibly. You have not encountered a beholder in your time. Go ahead and roll an intelligence check.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: God, it's ironic that I don't even know how to do that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just modifier.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Plus two.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Yeah. So 12.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Do what you want to do!

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Thanks for that! How far away can I get?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I mean, you can move six squares. 30 feet, so.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Can we move to behind that wall? Is that possible?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yup.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: And then, I still can see him, though, but he can look at me, and I'm just going to be wasting stuff if he-- So I'm going to hold my action until he's not staring right at me. Can we do that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: There's not much I can do. Yeah. So that's what I'm going to do. Going to run away.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, that ends your turn. It is now the beholder's turn. The beholder is going to float up towards the ceiling of the area--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How high does he go?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is going to put it at--

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: 25 feet, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is going to be-- let's see-- Need to find something to weigh that down, actually.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Make a sandbag.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Perfect. All right, so it is approximately 20 feet up right now, which gets it out of predominantly melee range of most anything at the moment.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So now when it looks down at us, does it change the direction of the cone?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The cone still spreads in the area. And it's going to look right there. So it looks away from you, Kash, so what action did you want to prepare?

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Should we try it now, do you think? I'm going to try to blind it. So if he can't see, maybe he can't do some shit. So I'm going to cast Blindness at a third level.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He's reading 'Blindness' right now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so, constitution saving throw-- That is a 19. Where's the DC?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's fucking 18.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It resists the spell, unfortunately.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Oh, shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It can't get a ray towards the four of you, so it's going to do one ray at Zahra, one ray at you, Kashaw, and another ray at Zahra. Zahra gets two rays. So, Mary, I need you to make a constitution saving throw.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: With inspiration.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you need it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Add your inspiration, add your inspiration.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: With an inspiration-- I have Luck, too.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ooh! Yeah, yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So you're at 18.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 18. Okay. A similar yellowish ray that hit Grog earlier strikes past you and it hits you, but you manage to resist the effect. A light blue ray streaks across towards you, Kashaw. I need you to go ahead and make a wisdom save.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: A wisdom save?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Third ray goes towards you, Zahra. I need you to make a dexterity saving throw.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: I have no dexterity--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Come on, use Luck if it's sucky.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 17. You manage to duck out of the way as it slams into the wall behind you. This entire chunk, now, is gone.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What's behind there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see there's a chunk of rock and earth that has been exposed on the opposite side as it just disintegrated that portion of the room.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: He can also just take apart pieces of the model, that's amazing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That ends its turn. And now-- Because at the top of the round--

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Thank you, Scanlan! Love, kisses, kisses and love.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Out of one of the slimy surfaces in the room you see, all of a sudden, the stone opens up a phantom eye that just appears out of nowhere, not even attached to this beholder. As it does, another beam streaks out of it--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes. This is going to be--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This'll be at Scanlan.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Where did the beam come out of? Where's the eye? Where's the phantom eye?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I need you to make a constitution saving throw, Scanlan.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Constitution this time? 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 20! All right. As a familiar beam hits you and begins to lift you off the ground, you manage to grab onto the side of the stonework and pull yourself out of its force before it can throw you into the same hole that Kima had tumbled into.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Grog, you're up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'd like to run directly beneath it and slightly behind him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hold! Hold.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And I would like to use the Chain of Returning on Craven Edge and throw it up into the bottom of the Beholder.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, go ahead and roll for an attack.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits! With a five, it fails its saving throw, so you take a plus one strength, he takes a minus one strength.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yay, amazing! 19.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, 19 points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, great. The blade sinks into it, as you yank it back, go ahead and make an athletics check to pull the blade back.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, that's an eight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's an eight-- You yank on the chain, and it's just still embedded in the bottom of the beholder, you can't seem to pull it back.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's all right. Go for a ride.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's like a balloon in the Macy's Day Parade.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I did get the one strength one?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You did, yes. All right, Grog, is that the end of your turn?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Scanlan, you're up. You lucky, lucky gnome, it's your turn.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He's 25 feet up?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 20 feet up, technically.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: If I aim a Fireball right at the roof, will it hit any of us?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right at the roof?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: 20-foot radius.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It might, you don't know. Depends on where you're hitting. If you aim it up here, it may hit Grog.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just do it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll aim on the far side of the beholder.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Over here?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, just up from there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, you can't see that wall area because it's all blocked there, you can only see through this passage. So you can only hit anything on the ceiling and this way. Unless you move into the room.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, I'll just try to get it as far away from Grog as I can.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So we'll say about there is where you can hit it. Go for it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay! Wand of Fireballs, and I'll do it at fourth level.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay! What is the DC for the wand?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: If I use my-- Does that go through the Handcone?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not for the wand, no. The wand has its own DC. It should--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The wand has-- ew, a DC of 15.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. It does make the save, so it takes half damage. So go ahead and roll damage on that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do I have to make a save?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Currently with the blast area-- no, and it would have hit Percy, except for-- as the Fireball explodes, the fire just seems to dissipate around the cone, actually absolving the flame from its current position.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is he going to be affected?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He is affected, yes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. 30. So 15.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And do you want to move or are you going to stay where you are?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: If I move, he's going to hit me. I will inch away from the precipice?

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: "I will inch away from the Kima-hole."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: God, you even make that sound weird.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's see, who's going next-- I will inspire Percy with a song. I will sing: (sings) And if we're talking Percy, you got a perfect gun, so put it on me and pull that trigger, if you shoot him right, you'll end his life, on and on and on-- (cheering)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Take a d10 inspiration dice for that. All right, Percy, it's your turn.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: First I'm going to deal with this fucker in front of me, so I'm just going to pull out my sword and slash him and stab him and see what happens.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So using your quick draw you-- Well, you have one hand, so you can pull out a second weapon. So go for it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's a one-handed sword. That's 19 to hit?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 19 hits.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right, and that's ten points of damage?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ten points of damage. With that you eviscerate-- As it croaks out (croaks) and just falls to the ground gurgling, into a pile.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's the worst kill line ever. I especially floundered that one.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I ask a technical question?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: If I've held my action until he does something and he never does it, do I ever get to go?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nope.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I just hold it until the end of the turn?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep, and then you get a next turn.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So technically that's a gamble, and if the thing you ask for never happens you forfeit your turn?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Let me check the rules real fast just to make sure, because I don't want to screw you over.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's good to know I'm gambling that away if--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Let me double-check, because the internet will let me know if I mess it up. It's technically readying an action, so--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Did you remember Hunter's Mark?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Because I can't do any magic on him, because he's looking at me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: How it is with this, essentially, is you wait for the trigger, or you can ignore the trigger, which means if you want to, you can just do it at any point if it never happens, so at the end of the next person's turn, you could unleash--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Say 'screw it.'

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Totally.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So you can just chime in and say, 'Fuck what I said, I'm going now'?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So, my other question is, my attempt to cast a spell while in the cone-- does that cancel out that spell so I can't cast it anymore?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Beholders, man. They're assholes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to make a run for cover towards the-- where's the laser pointer?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Towards which way?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Run that way. There. Am I still in its--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: One more, if you want to.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay, and while I'm running I'm going to take a shot, I'm going to pull out the big gun and take a shot with the big gun.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And I'm going to attempt to make this a legs/wing hit, and I'm going to try and knock him down.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Does not have legs, does not have wings.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, shit, okay, that's fair.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hovering entities aren't really affected by prone. You would know that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No they're not. That's very fair. In that case, I'm going to just do a sharpshooter shot and see how this goes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Roll well. And I have inspiration, which I'm going to add to that. So that's-- That's 18 to hit?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 18 just hits. Scanlan comes through again!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Thank you! That's very useful. Where's my other d12? Why do I never have any d12s? There they are.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Keyleth, you're on deck, so be prepared.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Nine, ten, 11, 12-- That's 28 points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 28 points of damage!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And reload, and that's the end of my turn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's the end of your turn, that's all your attacks. Okay. That ends it with Percy. At the end of your turn, Percy, it's going to do one of its eye rays. This one is going to be towards Grog, because Grog is out of the cone and rushed underneath, throwing the blade up, and stuck into it. One of the eyestalks shoots down-- Okay, Grog, I need you to roll a dexterity saving throw.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I get advantage on those. Because of-- D-D-D-Danger Sense! 19-- 21.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What kind of ray was it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It was a black ray that streaked towards you. A ray you're very familiar with.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I remember that one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, Keyleth. It's your go.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Question. Did enough stones fall out of the ceiling that might be, like, me-shaped?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not from the ceiling, no. You currently only have two--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: From the Fireball?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, because it's mostly flame. It's the impact and explosion, it's not enough to damage the structure of it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is the ceiling considered worked stone or is it just carved out?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you wanted to, like, shape up there and try and break through it, you could attempt that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, let's do that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Like, the hole that was already created by Scanlan's Fireball?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So, you-- what's your movement as an earth elemental?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, I dunno, I'm doing the Earth Glide, so-- Oh! 30 feet? Do I make it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 20-- 30-- it's cutting it close.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Just make it? Okay. And I just want to--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, go ahead and make a strength check, with the strength of the earth elemental.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh wait, was that cocked? I don't know. I don't think so. And it's not great, no, seven.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Seven? No, you pull up and you slam your fist into the stone beneath you, and it cracks a little bit, but not enough to give way at all. So you are currently resting up in this vicinity.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's my turn?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I mean, that's your action and your movement.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Try it again next time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She can heal--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "Okay! Not dead!"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: "Think I'll take a walk!"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At the end of your turn, it's going to attempt another eye ray. This one is going to be at Kashaw. Five through-- well, actually, those they don't have to reroll for the same, because they're each different turns. I need you to make a dexterity save, Kashaw.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's great. All right, so you dodge the same black ray that just streaked past Grog, ducking out of the way as it (vmm) across the wall. All right, that brings us to Zahra.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Now, my question is, because Witch Bolt is a concentration, I still have a cantrip of Eldritch Blast, which is not a concentration. May I use Witch Bolt, just the single--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Witch Bolt is an action to use and it only does 1d12.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Yes, I know, but it's still going, so technically it's an automatic 1d12 damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, you have to use your action to do it, which means you can't cast any other spells if you do it.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: I can't cast any other spells.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Big hairy balls. All right, I'm going to Eldritch Blast, plus invoke Agonizing Blast, which does not use a spell slot.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so go ahead and roll three attacks with your ranged spell attack against the beholder.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: These are d12s. I need d10s.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You need 20s for attacks.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Oh, just attack? I'm going to use Luck. 12?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Plus?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Plus your attack modifier.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: I'm sorry. So that's 23.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so that hits. Second one?

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: (groans) 13.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Misses. And the third one?

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Natural one.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Can't Luck on that?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't think so.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so go ahead and roll 1d10 plus five.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Six plus five. 11.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 11 points of damage as your beam streaks and blasts it from the side--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I use my action, since that's the end of it, right? I pop out and I shoot two arrows at him. (grunts) That's it. Just like (groans).

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: That was awesome.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Both of the attacks do not get the magical bonus to hit and damage, so whatever your attack bonus is minus two to damage and hit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Because of my bracers. No.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Actually, it would be minus four. All of your magical equipment doesn't work when you're in its eye.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know, but my bracers only add to damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right, but your actual bow is magical and adds to hit and damage. Minus two to hit and minus four to damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Four to damage?! Why four?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Technically, it's just supposed to be plus two to hit on that item, actually. Misunderstanding. It's all good. So?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, this one is 29.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits. And the other one is?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is with the minus two?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, they both hit. Roll damage on each, minus four.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, god. That's pathetic. Five. Ten.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so that brings us back to the end of Zahra's turn, where it uses its third and final ray.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: I haven't moved.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you can move if you want to. Where do you want to move?

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Actually, I'm going to stay where I am.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. This last ray is going to--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So tense in the silent moment before he said that.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: I know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This one's going to be at Scanlan, since all of the rays have hit everything else.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Everybody's hiding.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Everyone's in his cone or hiding and Scanlan's the one little visible one there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, that's right. He can't attack anything within his own cone.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, I need you to make a constitution saving throw, Scanlan.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 17? All right. Jesus Christ, guys. You take, as this shimmering purple ray slams into your chest, you manage to get most of the ray to not impact you in the flesh, but where it hits, you do take some damage, so you suffer 16 points of necrotic damage. All right. Vex, you're up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I am going to-- (scoffs) If I run back to where I was standing, am I out of its fricking cone?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You would be, yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You'd have to get over there to get to a space out of it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right, I'm going to shoot from my Sky Sentinel at him. That's my first attack for that, and that is 22 for the first arrow, because it splits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hits.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, that was wrong. No, that's right. Oh, that was weird. 16?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Misses. You get two hits on that with the Sky Sentinel.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, so that adds 1d6 to my damage with those.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. Balls. Eight, nine, ten.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Kill it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 16 for the first. 14 for the second. And then my second attack, I want to shoot through my Blazing Bowstring at it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, go ahead and roll for attack on that one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As the arrow ignites in the middle of the air, the enchantment is too strong and actually burns the arrow to a cinder before it reaches its target. Just scattering ash against its body.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I hope that wasn't one you notched with the owlbear feathers.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, no, that wasn't one of my owlbear arrows, for sure. I'm going to duck behind the wall right there, if I can.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Actually, currently, all of the areas of the wall are taken by Trinket and Kashaw. You could have Trinket move out of the way.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: This is taken!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Wow. From the mother's mouth.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I love you! Move.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Get out of the way.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's got 40, so technically he could make it behind that other wall.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so. At this point in time, now, you can see where the slime all over the walls-- All of a sudden, a series of tendrils begin to whip out of them.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wow.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What is happening?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so, good to know. So now pretty much all of the slime-covered walls in here and within this hallway are now reaching out these semi-translucent, almost created out of the same slime, tendrils that are reaching out and grasping.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What the--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Over every part of the wall?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: How far out?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Out to here, so it's within ten feet.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Everything at the walls. Anything hiding.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, good. I'm glad that we're all right next to a wall.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Vax, it's your turn.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Can you show me where his glance is, again, with that doohickus you have?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have to guess. You don't know the specific elements of his ray.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to use Cunning Action to hide.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, first and foremost, at the beginning of your turn, I need you to make a dexterity save.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, evasion. Yeah, don't worry. That's 30.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Don't say you're using evasion yet. It doesn't damage you. Or you could have wasted your evasion for no reason. However, you do avoid being grappled as they try and grab onto you and hold onto you. You can use your bonus action to--?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hide.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, roll a stealth check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That is a 25.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 25, okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to run past Trinket along the back wall, all around the edge, over to where Vex and Kash are.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, right there.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to keep pushing along--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This is our spot!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to get between them, and I know that slows the movement down, but I want to be in there, and I'm going to use my two actions left to throw daggers at the floating fucking bowling ball with eyes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I duck so he can shoot.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do not have advantage, because it rolled a natural 20 on its perception check and you are not stealthed.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, wow. So the first one is a 21.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah. Second one is a 17.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That misses.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So it's a measly little attack of nine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nine points of damage. A little toothpick impact. That ends your turn.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Wow.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Kash, at the beginning of your turn, I need you to roll a dexterity save.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Ten.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ten. The tendrils wrap around you, and you're currently grappled, which means you cannot move.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Okay, so can I cast-- well, can I use Freedom of Movement on myself?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You could, yeah, if you really wanted to.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: But I guess it wouldn't matter because then that's my turn, right? Am I taking any damage as it's holding onto me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, it's just holding you in place.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It just feels really uncomfortable.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Then I guess there's not much I can do.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You can still cast a spell.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Can I cast a spell still?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can certainly try to, yeah.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: All right, then I'm going to try, even from there, being grappled, a 6th-level Flame Strike.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Woo!

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Let's try to do some damage here, if we can.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So he's going to make his dex save, which he makes, so he takes half damage, but go ahead and roll 8d4. Oh, sorry, 8d6 points of damage.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: d6. That's not bad at all. So we got ten, 16, 21, 22, 23, 24, 25, 26.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 26, nice. So half of that would be 13.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 13 points of fire and radiant damage as the column of flame bursts up around, impacting. You feel the impact from beneath you, from the blast of it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Did it maybe loosen a little bit of stone up a little bit more?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Maybe.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Nice. And then I can't do anything because I'm grappled, so I can't even move.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're grappled, so you can't move. You're there.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: That was my level six spell.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. That ends your turn. It is now the beholder's turn.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's been a while, hasn't it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The beholder is going to turn this way.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughs) Hey!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hi!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's going to back up this way, and it's going to stare down in this direction now.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Does Grog travel with it, since he's hanging from the chain?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Do you want to hold on?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. It's my fucking sword.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeehaw!

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: That is the greatest kite ever.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So that's going to be three eye ray shots.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Bye, guys.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, you're fine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you're in the cone. It can't hit you with its eye ray. However, based on the visual there, it's going to be two rays against Kashaw and one against you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Vex. Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It can see me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Against you, Kashaw, I need you to make a constitution saving throw.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: (sighs) Nine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Your muscles tense up and lock as you are paralyzed for a minute. You're frozen. While being held by the tentacles.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Sweet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can't do anything on your turn.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How do you like them tentacles now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It still saw you. I need you to make a dexterity saving throw.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Come on.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This part of the wall actually, however, blasts out from the impact there as the Disintegration ray destroys the stonework. All right, and Kashaw, I need you to make-- oh, no, you--

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: I can't do anything, you said.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can't. You are paralyzed, so you automatically fail dexterity saving throws.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh my god, that's bad.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That ends its turn. Grog, you're up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I run as far into the alcove that is at his rear, just underneath him, as far as I can? Yeah, right there. Maybe one step closer, so right underneath him.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're still attached to the thing?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, so I'd like to pull the blade out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so this will be your bonus action to pull it out. Make your athletics check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And can I-- awesome. 23?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. You pull the blade out and catch it in your hand.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I hold the rest of my action and look at Scanlan and say, hey, Scanlan! Could you give me a lift?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Maybe!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All right, I'm going to hold my action for Scanlan.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughing) Okay. All right. At the end of Grog's turn-- Actually, Grog. I fucking forgot to do that. I need you to make a dexterity saving throw, which you have advantage on.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Vex, I need you to make another dexterity saving throw.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fucking make this shit. Make it!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 14? Okay. You keep rolling high. It's interesting, I'm missing a bunch of different rays because they aren't even doing anything.
