Well, this one, however: a similar black ray streaks downward and slams into you. You take 55 points of necrotic damage. All right, that is going to bring it to Scanlan's turn.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I hoof it towards the altar as fast and as far as my--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's as far as you can get, there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Shit. That's as far as I can go?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 25 feet. You're a gnome, man. Tiny little legs.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can he see me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't know. We'll find out if you try something.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: As a bonus action, can I move a couple more feet? (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It doesn't work that way, buddy. Sorry.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wow, that's a tight angle.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (cheering)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to cast Bigby's Hand.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Where?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And I'm going to do something unorthodox that the DM is going to have to approve.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Where were you putting the hand, by the way?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Around Grog.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And I would like to swing Grog like a hammer at the back of the thing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're fastball special-ing him with Bigby's Hand?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's a goliath hammer!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, I want you to go ahead and make a strength check. So roll a d20 and add eight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Grog, you go flying up in the air with the added strength of Bigby's Hand behind you. What are you doing?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm just slashing as I'm flying through the air.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You get plus eight onto each damage roll from the force of Bigby's Hand.

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All two of them. All two of them. So plus eight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, plus eight to damage, not hit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Plus eight to damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, so the first one? They're reckless attacks, so you have advantage on them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 19 hits. Second attack?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Slow motion.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, this is going to be nasty, man.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Kill him, Grog!

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Kill him!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Five, 10, 18, 28, 36 for the first one.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Was that 26?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 36 for the first.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ooh.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nine, 14, 22, 32. Plus eight is 40.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Woo!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You give it a minus two strength. Its strength is reduced by two more.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You bump up one.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He's fine.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: He's so fine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Falling prone. You take ten points of damage from the impact. Halved to five-- well, no, it's not bludgeoning damage, it's just falling damage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's like a hard sneeze.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you take ten points of fall damage and are prone on the ground.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And Bigby's dissipates, I assume.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Bigby's just chilling right there where you left it, so.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh! Okay. Great.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, great! That ends-- at the end of your turn, Scanlan--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I would like to use my bonus action to inspire, who's about to go-- Vex!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Me!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Vex! Who's taking selfies of her--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I was taking a snapsnot.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (cheering)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It didn't make any sense at all.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. So, at the end of your turn, Scanlan, it's going to go ahead and use another one of its eye rays.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, Jesus. Should've healed myself. I'm dead.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This one's going to be at you. Make a constitution saving throw, Scanlan.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Come on, Scanlan!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's 11, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 11. You take 36 points of necrotic damage from the enervation ray.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, Percy, you're up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay! I'm going to circle around the side of the wall.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Just buck myself against the wall. I'm going to take a couple shots with Bad News.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: For a first shot, I'm going to be doing-- ah, fuck it, let's take a sharpshooter shot. Let's see what happens.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's 18, 19, 20, 23, 24, that hits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits, yes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: 25. So that does 11, 21 points of damage?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nice. Reload?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Reload. Firing again. Also another sharpshooter shot. 23?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 23 hits.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Reloading.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Another Sharpshooter shot.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Kill him!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That hits! That's the same, I have 13 for-- yeah, that hits. Six, seven, eight, nine, ten, that's 26 points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Looking rough, man!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How's this thing still alive?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Blood is, like, seeping from under the large eye, it's like (groans).

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I reload one last time and I am going to try and hide behind that column right over there.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Nice. Nice work, Percy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At the end of your turn it's going to do its third and final one. All right, this is going to be at Zahra. No, Zahra, you're in its cone, so it's not going to aim it at you. You're paralyzed--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (chuckles) "And you're paralyzed."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, it's there-- Vex, you're up!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Fuck!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Vex, I need you to go ahead and make a dexterity check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. 24?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you're fine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 23, all right. The interesting rays aren't coming up, it's really pissing me off.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: The interesting rays.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: These are just, like, rays that just do damage, there's ones that do cool stuff. All right, Keyleth, you're up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. I forgot this last time; as a siege monster, I can deal double damage to objects and structures. I'm assuming this is a structure, yeah? If I want to, like beat through it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, so I'm going to do a slam attack through it. Come on! Ah, fuck. I don't know if that stone'll respond. Oh, this is to the wall, though, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The wall, yes. It has, like, no armor class.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So 14.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, go ahead and roll damage. Double damage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: To the wall. 2d8 plus five.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Keyleth, attack the monster, not the wall!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Five, so that's 24 damage. To the ceiling.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The ceiling breaks as you move forward, falling down.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm just going to try and once again catch him in--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: How many attacks do you have as the--?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I have two. I have a multiattack; I can use two slam attacks.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: True. So you do one slam attack to break it; for a second attack you could attempt to--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: To, like, punch the beholder into the ground?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, you can attempt to make a slam attack to push it down, if that's what you're wishing to do.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's what I want to do.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, go ahead and make the attack.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah! Yeah, yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Big money, no whammies.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, okay, that's not bad, that's not bad. 21!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That was awesome. Okay. 21, that definitely hits. Let me just--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Kill him, Keyleth!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There we go. All right, so actually, that would be your athletics check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll take it!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What was the athletics for the form?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (laughs) Oh. I guess I just have my dex?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Strength.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: My strength? Which is a plus five.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, so, what's the total?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It was a total for my d20 roll?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That would be 18?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 18, that works. So no damage is dealt, but you punch the Beholder down back onto the ground, and you land at its side, right there.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is it on the ground or five feet above the ground?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Am I, like, on top of it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's, like, five feet above the ground; it's still within-- You're not on top of it per se, because you didn't grapple, you slammed it. So you land next to it, essentially.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Nice job, Thing.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, so I just brought him down. Do I do any damage?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You take six points of fall damage from the impact. No big deal.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Mmm, I shouldn't say it. Do you get to stay as an earth elemental if you're right in front of him?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's right, is it a magical ability?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Beast Sense? Beast Shape?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Checking right now.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I was wanting to, like, ride him, stand on top of him--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right, but as part of the-- that would be a grapple, as opposed to a slam, so unfortunately that wouldn't be the case. And for--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I would've had to, like, specify?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Keyleth returns to her normal form.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That sucks. I can't crawl backwards? I can't, y'know, like-- butterfly effect?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, that was the placement where you were above it, unfortunately. All right. That ends your turn, though. Zahra, you're up.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: (sighs) All right. Oh, it's looking towards me-- hmm.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I do a bonus action, then, if I fell out of my form, and cast a spell as a bonus action?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I cast Grasping Vine? No, wait, no, never mind, I can't grapple.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oi! Look at the guy right behind you!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, I'll cast Healing Word on Scanlan.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughing) There you go!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay! You go ahead and cast the spell, and as you reach behind-- No effect.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, son of a fuck, I'm in his fuckin' front eye! God damn it. Shit-- cock-- balls--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You've got, like, 12 healing potions!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They don't work in front of him, right? They're magic?

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: They're potions, though--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: One way to find out. What are you doing, Zahra?

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: All right, I'm going to... One, two, three, four, five, six. I'm going back behind him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're aiming at the screen, I don't know where that is.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: There. And then I'm going to use my Charred Dark Staff, being right next to the son-of-a-bitch, and I will use Witch Bolt one more time, only because it's got the biggest amount of damage. I'll use it at fifth level, so I'll still have one charge left on my staff.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right! So go ahead and roll a d20 with your spell attack modifier.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, Zahra, you're going to get him. I can feel it.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: (cheering)

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: That was three, baby! That's my Z right there!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and roll your damage. So that's 5d12.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Whoa! This could do it!

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: All right, these are all d12s.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Those are all 12s, yes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Times two-- 70.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Whoa, wait, what? Two? Wait? Huh?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: She critted.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so it's 35 points of damage on, from the five--

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Plus two.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, the plus two's after. 35 times two, so that would be 70 points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, how do you want to do this? (cheering)

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Scanlan, how would you like to use Bigby's Hand to do this?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Bigby's Hand is not doing it, you're the one doing it!

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: I'm doing it, all right, I want to stick my bloody staff into his eyeball and make him explode.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. My token's not facing the right way.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll use Bigby's Hand to catch some of the sinew and blood and--

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: (laughing) Some of the spewing!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so. As you glance over at Scanlan and give him that visual perspective of, "Let's do this," you glance over, reach out your hand and pull Bigby's Hand towards you. It streaks up and grabs the back of the beholder like a baseball, just palming it, thrusting it down towards you, Zahra. Its mouth open, it reaches down, teeth open, momentarily frustrated by the moment, it's going to use this to try and bite down. As you reach up, you slam your staff up into its mouth and release the Witch Bolt at ground zero from the inside of its body. The eye widens for a second as the top of the staff pierces the upper part of its palate, and with a burst of black and bluish electrical energy, the entirety of its skull just (explosion), just detonates from the inside, sending chunks of slimy flesh and bone and whatever brain matter resides inside the cranium of this beholder scattering across the room.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Are we all covered in muck?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, you are.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Yes!

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Oil can!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I immediately call out, help Kash!

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Kash!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And I start running to the edge. Kima! Are you all right?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I run to the edge with Vax, since I saw fucking Kima go over.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Can I go over and help Kash?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes. Well, as the beholder dies, the ray eventually fades off-- And the tendrils retract into the wall.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: So I pull him up, pick him up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I run to look over the edge to take care of Kima, too.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Covered in muck, I look at my brother and I say, are you all right?

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: I'm all right, thank you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm pulling the rope out and trying to lower it over the edge.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Rappelling.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You hear the voice echoing from inside: "I'm all right! Relatively speaking."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Vax is coming down to get you!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hold on, yeah, yeah, I'll give a-- piggy-back you up, come on. Just wait a moment.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you come down, pulling your dagger out and using it as a torch, down in the inside as you're lowered, you can see there are hundreds of partially eaten corpses of those fish humanoids that you encountered earlier, as well as what appears to be various cradles of gathered slime and putrescence, the real core of where this Beholder had been existing at the bottom of this tomb.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: If you'd gone down there, I would've jumped right down there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Kima's down there, currently holding one shoulder. You can see, she's tended to herself with her wounds for the most part on her own, but just currently looks up, like, "I've got nothing." As soon as you descend from the pit dangling from the rope, she goes: "Okay! Good."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hold on, let's tie you up. Grog?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to tie her up, you're going to pull her up first, and then throw it down and get me.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Pull her up and throw her down?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah-- no! Almost! Just pull Kima up!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Step two is coming! And I'm going to use perception on this pile of bones down here as she gets yanked up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Look for any loot!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll investigation.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Should we go to the tomb?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm chugging a greater healing potion while I look around for any loot around the altar and around the dead bodies.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And we're going to walk up to the altar and push the sarcophagus open.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So you guys move up and push the sarcophagus open. As you guys slowly start bringing Kima up, the rope itself tense with the weight, 'cause she's wearing a lot of armor, but it manages to pull her up without issue. You go ahead to the top of the sarcophagus there and it is covered in black feathers, some of which got pushed off in the battle. You shove the top open and you can see inside a skeletal corpse that is resting, surrounded by what looks like very, very fine golden and silver jewelry that have just been laid at its sides. And on the corpse itself, you can see there is a set of jet-black studded leather armor that has a series of runic engravings and carvings along pretty much every square inch of the leather. And you can see around the the mantle of it, where the leather mantle falls, the edge is trimmed with black feathers.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's hot.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's fuckin' sick.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's some Labyrinth of Jareth shit right there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Artists, go!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an investigation check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 15, a very average 15.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm trying to-- Brother, I'm going to go look at the stuff that they're finding, okay? Be safe!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. I'm looking through some bones.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And I run over to the sarcophagus.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You find what looks to be-- roughly, within the brief time you've spent, and you've spent like a good ten minutes kind of, like, combing through the slime, you find about six gold pieces.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, wow. Are there any fish-guy bones?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Plenty of fish-guy bones, yeah!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I play a couple of them on the wall. Do a little song.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. It's beautiful with the echo, it gives it this sort of reverberation effect to it.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Kash walks over and heals Kima.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm a little embarrassed."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughs) All good, Kima!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It was a very long fall! And I survived that--"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You did! Did you feel anything squish when you landed?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Eh, nothing I couldn't handle."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Did you black out?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Did you pee your underoos?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) Make an insight check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Shit, my insight's balls-- Five.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, man. She owned that fall!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, you's a badass bitch.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: It was a heck of a scream as you went down.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Grog!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Throw down the rope! Please?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Pretty please?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Without holding onto the other end? No, no, no, I know what he means.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's infinite rope!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, but I would throw the whole thing down. I throw it down to him.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Are there any beholder teeth left? Anything? Any sort of--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I mean, there are chunks of, there are a few full teeth that you could try and take.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Keyleth actually goes over and starts doing her harvesting thing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not a whole lot left to harvest. Like, it is destroyed. There's a few eyestalks that you could probably pull.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, that's true, I'll check out the eyestalks.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can we perception check the tomb and see if it's safe to grab shit out of it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure, go ahead and make an investigation check

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hey, Vax, you got that rope yet?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Thank you!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to-- Very gently, I'm removing the leather armor from the body.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, I need Vex, I need Percy, and I need Trinket to all make dexterity saving throws.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Evil shit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: One.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Dead. Instant death.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Why are you rolling twice?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: For Trinket!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to use one of my re-reroll a saving throw.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Six for Trinket! It's a good night, you guys.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Did I find any loot in the bodies of the losers? The little guys?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You find a bunch of shitty spears, crappy leather, and through all them all, about 12 gold pieces.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That can almost buy a book. 21.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You manage, as you reach out and grab for the armor, as your fingers touch it, there's this vibration and it seems like the shadows, the nearby shadows in the corners, seem to reach up towards your hands. You pull back in time, but you and Trinket notice a little too late as there's a burst of death. A burst of death energy that just bursts out for a ten-foot radius around the entire sarcophagus. You avoid it. Both you and Trinket suffer 56 points of necrotic damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm unconscious. Trinket--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Does that bring you below zero?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Vex's body falls and hits the stonework, and you look over as you see her eyes stare up, the last bit of air escaping from her lungs as the life drips out of her form.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh shit.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: What?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What's going on?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Running over.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: What? Running over, pouring a healing potion in her mouth, instantly, as quickly as possible.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: I can revive her too.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Kash, do something.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The healing potion has no effect, and as you go to her, you can already feel the clutch to her skin. Her body is instantly cold from the necrotic blast.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Kashaw!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You glance over at the sudden intense energy of the room and see your sister lying cold and lifeless on the ground, being cradled by Zahra.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The fuck happened?

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Kash, Kash, Kash.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: I can raise the dead.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I run over.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: I can revivify or I can raise the dead.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Revivify, revivify.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Let's do it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm already running over. I'm picking her up. What happened? I was only down there for 30 seconds.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Do you have it prepared?

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: What do you mean?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Do you have it prepared as one of your prepared spells?

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: I believe so, yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Check your list to see if it has a little dot next to it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm pouring a greater potion in her mouth.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. No effect.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The fuck is going on?

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Yes, I do.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do it. Do it.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: I do. I have it prepared.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's true. It's written down. It's true.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do it.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: And I have third levels left.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh my God, I'm shaking.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: I can bring her back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You rush over. You reach in your pouch and pull out a bit of clustered diamonds in your hand that you keep just in case for such a circumstance, and as you place them out, you sprinkle them across her chest, pushing Vax a little bit away, knowing that you need the concentration on this, at which point you pull up the symbol, and this type of magic, life and death magic, draws a little closer than you feel comfortable with Vesh, and you realize at this moment that you're going to have to make the choice to possibly call her attention forth.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Call whose attention forth?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What are you hesitating for? Do it. Whatever the fuck you're going to do, do it.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: She could destroy everything.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What do you mean, she could destroy? What do you mean?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Who's she?

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: That's what I mean.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Kashaw, you're running out of time.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Who's she?

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: I'm going to bring her back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Her body lifts slightly in place, her arms just draped, dangling and scraping against the stone beneath her as she's elevated there. How do you guys want to help with this ritual?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I take out three of my shards of residuum, and I place them in where the crystals are as an extra offering.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you place the residuum across where the diamond dust was shattered and use that as almost a focus for the energy from the spell. All right, I need you to go ahead and roll an intelligence check. Just roll a d20 and add your intelligence modifier.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to throw up. Oh no.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I can use my rerolls as well, correct? I can't use my--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's for saving throws, not for ability checks. What did you roll?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Six.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Six. The energy itself vibrates within the glass shards, which then shatter, seemingly not able to focus the energy of the spell.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: I take my enchanted moonstone from my staff and place it next to her.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so as you take the moonstone, and-- are you speaking to your patron to aid with this?

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: I am.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so as you take the moonstone and hold it aloft, you place it near the focus of Kashaw's ritual. The dull white glow begins to intermingle with the dark, shattered energy of Vesh's grant, and as they impact, it creates this strange grey swirl. I need you to go ahead and roll an arcana check. Roll a d20 and add your arcana skill to it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Depending on what she does, I'd like to do something next.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (whispered) That's good. That's good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Who wants to make the third and final attempt to aid?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I do.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, sure, I will let you do that.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I pull my sister in close, and I say, take me instead, you raven bitch.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and make a persuasion check. With advantage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Your vision clears, and you find yourself looking up at the partially broken stone ceiling of the dark altar into the face of your brother, tears streaming down his face, the rest of your friends gathered around.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What happened?

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Hello, darling.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I feel so cold.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You were knocked out.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Knocked out?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughs) Did we find anything?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do I feel or sense anything different?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (exaggerated sobbing) God.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: I take my stone and put it back in my staff.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Why are you crying?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm not crying, stupid.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: I'm all right. You people suck.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I just hand Vex 30 gold and say, sorry about before.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What happened?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You fucking died.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Grog.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. We turned around. I pull your brother out of the pit, and you're laying there lifeless on the floor.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At which point, you immediately have this perpetual slapping of wet bear tongue across your face as Trinket is just (bear noises) nuzzling up against you and, like, pressing all his weight against your body to an almost intense degree.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right, all right. Your breath is lovely. Okay. How did I--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How do you feel?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I feel-- I feel cold?

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Here, take my cape.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How am I not dead, then, if I died--?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's a good question. Vax, how are you feeling?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (softly) Vax--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I walk out of the chamber.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait, Percy, did you set off a trap? Is that how I died?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughing nervously) Well-- who brought me back?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Kash.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And your brother.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And Zahra.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I grab Kash by the hand and, just to him: What does this mean?

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: To be honest, I have no idea.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Why did you do that?

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: 'Cause I knew you wanted me to.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hey, Vex, do you want any, like-- ale or anything? You-- I got some, like, firewater?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It'll warm me up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We need to get those-- those leathers, those vestiges or whatever, and get the-- out of here.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, I think that was the problem, right? Did we get it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, that's-- the moment you touched it is when that blast went off.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can we not-- can we investigate it and see if there's any traps? I mean, how do we make sure it doesn't happen again?

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Well, let's keep you away from it for now, darling. Have a sip of firewater, just to warm you up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Here, here's a big flask of firewater.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Can we read any of the runes that are on the--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you walk back up to the altar and look on the inside, the corpse is dust. The blast, whatever it was, while it didn't damage anything, seemingly, the remains are dust. The armor is laid there, same place it was when you found it, if a little slumped in without any sort of something to fill it out. Also, most of the jewelry that's there has turned green and seems to have been robbed of whatever precious metal it was once contained. The only thing that sticks out to you is what looks to be a black crystal that comes to a point on one end. It has a loop on it like it was part of a medallion or a necklace or some sort of a loop to carry on a chain. Those are the only two things you see within.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: So the leather is gone?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, the leather is there. The corpse is gone.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Yes. All right. Is there any way to pick this up without touching it? I mean, is there any way to-- can I use Mage Hand to lift it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, yeah. It's pushing the boundaries of Mage Hand, but you can try.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: I can hold up to ten pounds.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. It's full leather armor. You can just-- I'd say--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can assist, I've got Mage Hand as well.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Look, I'm a giant tank and I've got a super long, like, sword, I could try and give it a pick-up if everybody backs away.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Well, what if I lifted it up and put it onto your sword, and then you could carry it out that way?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I was going to put it in the Bag of Holding.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Oh, put it in the Bag of Holding? Can I lift it up and put it in the Bag of Holding?

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Again, can we read anything that's written on it?

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Well, we need it, that's what's going to help you guys.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, all the runes are inscribed there; you can make an arcana check. Or religion check, one of the two, probably would.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: I glance at it, I can read. I have Eyes of the Runekeeper.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The language is a forgotten language. It has been dead for-- probably since before the Divergence. But your eyes clarify on it in the arcane nature of your sight. You pick up phrases throughout, and it is a tale of the creation of the Raven Queen. It is a tale of her ascendance from mortal to immortal. It is the history of her penance for ascending and taking the throne of another entity that was supplanted. It's just seemingly a history tale that is woven in with a very, very strong enchantment, and you see within each one of these little runic sections, there are mentions of elements: fire, ice, lightning, you know, it runs through all these various elemental arcane properties that are bound into this enchantment. You're not entirely certain what the nature of it is.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Well, do you want to put it into the Bag of Holding and then deal with it later, when you're up against these things?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Matt, I just did an arcana check and got a 23; does that help us know anything at all?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. It is very magical, it is very enchanted, and I'd say, based on the circumstances in looking at this, whatever the blast that was set off here, the runic elements that maintained that trap that were in the sarcophagus are currently expended.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. Let's take it!

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: All right, what about the jewelry and the black crystal?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can take the black crystal as well.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It was the runic things in the sarcophagus that set off that blast, not the leather itself?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't know. But there were two runic circles within the inside of the sarcophagus that were not visible when you first looked into it, that are both now visible and expended of energy.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All right, yeah, let's put it in the Bag of Holding. You want to Mage Hand onto my swordy, and then we shish-kabob it into the bag?

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Yes, I'll take the crystal as well. Is that the only thing-- the rest are all tarnished and green, yes?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: All right. So here's the black-- can I do an investigation check on the crystal at all, or--?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You'd probably have to take some time with it, like a short rest, to go ahead and ascertain the nature of it.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: All right. Well, maybe on the way back. I don't know. Get some insight-- so here. Mage Hand it up. There we are.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you gather your findings, your first retrieval of one of the Vestiges of Divergence a success, barring difficult circumstances. You make your way back out through the tomb.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I walk up to Vex. And I just say: you know, he loves you very, very much. So very much.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thank you, dear.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: I'm so sorry, but we still have to deal with the water and getting out of here. A stone-- don't we have a stone wall there? We still have to get out.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I still have one more Control Water spell I can do.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. Well, it wouldn't be an issue. We'll say for the sake of story brevity, you guys make your way up through the temple in relative silence, just taking in the moments that have transpired. Through the aid of Keyleth and the rest of the party, you manage to make your way back out the way you came, parting the remnants of the Marrowglade Loch, and start making your way back, in the darkened evening hours, towards Vasselheim.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We need rest!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Do you want to rest on the outside of the loch here?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I feel like we should maybe camp and sleep and rest up and get-- I don't know, it's up to you guys.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, no, I think a little treeline rest would be a good idea. Before we go anywhere else.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: I pull Vex aside and say, walk with me for a moment.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And I go with Kashaw.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: I'm not sure what just happened, but I need you to know that you're very dear to me. I've only known you for a short period of time-- At any rate, while you were gone, and I'm not sure how much time I'll be spending with you from now-- I have something for you. After our fight with Rimefang, I forged something for you as well. And it is one Arrow of Dragon-Slaying. And I want you to have this, if for some reason I'm not here, or I can't help you. I want you to use this to do whatever you can to get rid of these things.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (whispers) Thank you, Zahra.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: You're welcome.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Want to kill it.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Lots and lots of details.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Now it's Keyleth and Kashaw--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And I was very unsure of how you got all of your radiant powers, considering I didn't know what you believed in. But you must believe in something. So what is it?

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: She saved my life. She didn't have to, but she did. And she started to teach me what it meant to have family. I didn't really know what that was like until I first saw you guys together. I figured there was no way that was going to happen, and then there she was, and suddenly I had a sister. Once again I realized that, at the end, life conquers all.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, you did our family a great service today, and you didn't have to do that.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: He's a good guy, you know. And a hell of a warrior. A little creepy, the way he's always staring at you, but I can't really blame him.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You know, you're a good guy too, even though you try really hard to pretend not to be.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Don't let that get out, I got a reputation.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Thank you. For everything.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: There is something you have to do for me, though. You got to go and kill these fuckers.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You actually think we can do it?

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: I don't really know, but I know that no one else will be able to. I hope you can. That Grog guy's fuckin' huge.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, he is.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Stay near him. Behind him, maybe.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, yeah.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Or just stay near Vax. He'll look out for you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And thanks for looking out for me.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Yeah, you don't suck.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: By the way, y'know, you didn't need to apologize for stealing that kiss before, it was fine.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Well, that's good to know. It was only my second one!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What? Really? It was my first!

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Really?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Well, between us we've had three kisses now, I think we did pretty well.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Aww, yeah! High five!

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Oh, right!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Question. Who was your first kiss?

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: That would be my wife.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, sure, yeah.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, no, that makes sense.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: (deadpan) Well, this has been pleasant.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Cool, yeah, no, it has been-- (laughter)

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Very, very nice talking to you again. I'm glad that it's not awkward at all.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I-- Yeah.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Okay. All right.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, I c-- we should probably--

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: I'm going to camp across the way from you tonight, if that's all right. Just 'cause it's a little weird, so.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's fine. Okay.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: All right. Cool.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you guys head back, the rest of you have gathered at the same camp set-up you had the night before. Kima-- while you guys were doing this, Kima's fixed a little bit of a meal at the base and set up her own Bahamut arc of protection on the tree below where you guys are set up. As everyone gathers around, she kinda gets your attention for a moment and goes: "All right, so "best that I can understand, we have most of our allies and many of the survivors at your place, "right, in Whitestone?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "While you're seeking most of these things, that's where the bulk of our hope resides. This is "also, you say, where Allie is, and where the rest of the survivors of the Council are."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes, everyone. Everyone that we could save.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Okay. Well, for the time being, I'm probably going to head there and make sure that we "have defense in case any of these dragons manage to get some sort of wind that this is where their "possible usurpers are. They're going to hit it, and they're going to hit it hard. Want to make "sure that we have at least a decent chance of defending these people. So I figure, all strength "that we can spare, beyond those that are searching for these artifacts, go and stay there at the "moment. Besides, it'd be good to catch up with a few friends, myself."

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Lovely meeting you, Lady Kima. Come and find me when you return to Vasselheim.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You're welcome to join us in Whitestone. We could use the help over there."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Both of you?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Just a noble cause. Helping your friends, whatever."

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: I'd have to put it to the group of Vox Machina. Is that all right with you?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes! We'll meet you in Whitestone!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Whitestone would be honored.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: I'd be more than happy to. I'd be honored, actually.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, I mean, we're-- we'd be passing through, it'd be--

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Yeah. Fair enough. We'd love to help. Just the world and everything, so.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's a big, big world.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "And, just to put this out there, and I don't mean to say this in any selfish way, but I'm "really sick of sleeping in trees. Do you have one of those tree travel things you have already to "Whitestone? I could really use a bed."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sure, yeah. Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We could all head that way, actually.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: To Whitestone?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do we need to go back, I don't know, sleep for the night?

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: I think we could all use some rest, don't you?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We still have the Fire Ashari.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You guys want to go take a nap at Whitestone?

lines.name: LIAM, TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Could use a bed.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Great!"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Tree Stride.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As the tree opens-- Teleport via Plants. As the tree splits open, showing the portal, Kima, whose eyes light up, looks over. "That--"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: See? Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well played, druid. Well played." And she charges through eagerly, and you guys all follow suit out of the Sun Tree in Whitestone and find yourselves a comfortable bed to sleep for the evening. And that's where we'll call tonight's game. I know it was long, but also, due to scheduling shifts and, y'know, Will couldn't stay for the next week, I didn't want to have to leave in the middle of that, I wanted to give you guys closure to the arc. So thank you for staying for a long session.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Happy-one-year-anniversary extended edition.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: That's awesome.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We haven't had a near-death in ages! I am so sorry! I am so sorry! Oh god.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I had just rolled an investigation, before I could even-- I had just rolled to check for traps and then you pulled the stuff.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's only the Champion of the Goddess of Death, man.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, you know what? Thank you-- all of you-- for not--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (yells) What did you roll?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Huh? I rolled a 12.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: A 12, okay. What were you aiming for?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So it had gone to 12, and the success had brought it down to a nine. If I had rolled an eight or lower, you'd have been gone for good.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Would she or would I?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, she would've been gone for good. You would've had to have made a very serious journey elsewhere, possibly, to make that exchange.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: What about Trinket?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He survived, he didn't even go below zero on that hit. I was just already at 41, so it lowered me. He had four hit points left.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The best part of that was that you were totally out of the blast range, and you were like, "I want to go be there when they open up the sarcophagus." (explosion)

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Yeah! She ran back! Totally!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know! No, believe me, I am aware that my greed fucking did that to me. I am aware.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Life lesson.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: And will she learn from this moment?

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: I thought for a second I hadn't written down that spell, I was like, "Oh my god, wait, I didn't "write, oh, yes, there it is, thank god." Oh my god.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You still could've done Raise Dead, it just would've been a little more expensive.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: That's crazy, though--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, I thought Raise Dead just brought them back, like, to life as a zombie, that's what I thought.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Which means when you used previously before and we were in mid-combat, and I didn't want to do the whole frickin' ritual in the middle of the battle, so I let it go through.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Because Pike got on him next turn.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: That's crazy.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Like, "

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thank you, Mary and Will, for--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Thank you Mary and Will, yes!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And Mary, getting the "How do you want to do this?" again!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah! I know, man!

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: I like big beasts. And I--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That was, that was a good-- that was delightful overkill. That was, like six points left on that beholder. And you're like, "Oh, like 70-something."

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Because he was really slashed up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He was wrecked.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Still.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Yeah, he was.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Guys, well done. Well, welcome back, glad we're--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Never sleep again!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We, yeah, we'll see you next week. Hopefully we'll be announcing a special guest we'll have the following week, schedule barring. We'll have a guest in a couple of weeks, hopefully. Should be fun for the announcement. But guys, thank you so much for sticking with us as long as you have. And we'll see you next week. Is it Thursday yet?
